titleStmt.title: An affidavit made by James Percy claimant to the Earldom of Northumberland Whereas Adlard Welby gent is attourny for John Blackston Esq;
titleStmt.author: Percy, James, 1619-1690?

notesStmt.note: Title from heading and first line of text.
Reproduction of the original in the Harvard University Library.
